name: once-defined
description: A minimalistic boilerplate to wait for Custom Elements, or libraries, definition

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:babel && npm run min && npm run fix:default && npm run test
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck
scripts.fix:default: sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' index.js && sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' es.js && sed -i 's/({})/({}).default/' min.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
